Game.Name: Mahou Sensei Negima! - Private Lesson 2 - Ojamashimasuu Parasite de Chuu (Japan)
Game.plot: Mahou Sensei Negima! Private Lesson 2: Ojama Shimasu Parasite de Chu is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by Marvelous,which was released in Japan in 2006.Cheat: Gallery UnlockablesYou can access the Gallery using the rightmost option in the main menu (Options), and then picking the third option from the top (Gallery).
